website_summaries.verdict: Ships with multiple technologies aimed at improving the speed of the hard drive's performance.
pros: Offered in either 1 TB or 2 TB size
Able to load data more quickly than some cheaper drives by using flash-enhanced storage, which makes this a good option for games that need to access storage often
Will boot your computer more quickly than many HDDs
cons: Drive will run more slowly on slightly older computer setups, which may cause gaming errors

customer_reviews.title: Speedy load times on Xbox One S!
customer_reviews.text: Picked this bad boy to upgrade my Xbox One S storage. This thing is a beast! I play PUBG, NBA 2K18, and Destiny 2. PUBG: Buildings render and weapons spawn before I land - it's a beautiful thing and is my biggest plus with this drive. Loading times were very inconsistent on stock Xbox storage. NBA 2K18 - MyCareer games load MUCH faster. Noticed a slight improvement when loading the Playground from the start menu. Destiny 2 - Player menu (UI) loads a few seconds faster. Load times when traveling to the Tower from Orbit have improved. Overall, I'm very happy. A great (and cheaper) alternative to a spendy Xbox One X upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doing what it's supposed to do so far
customer_reviews.text: It's been a while now. This drive is nice and quiet and my OS is still pretty snappy. Again, not as great as my SSD, and not quite as great as I was hoping. But I would definitely recommend it for someone looking for a bit better performance and capacity on a budget. Original Review: Not as snappy as I was hoping but was running out of room on my SSD so I decided to give this drive a try because of the cost. Will give it some time for the flash to populate and we'll see if it picks up any.
customer_reviews.author: cartpauj

customer_reviews.title: Fast, quiet, better than WD.
customer_reviews.text: Installed just as easily as any other hard drive. This seagate replaced a failing WD black 1tb drive that started failing within a year. I use it for gaming primarily and there has been a noticeable decrease in load times for games like battlefield 1. It's also noticably less noisy than other drives I've used in the past, I can barely tell it's running unless I am right up next to the case. For the price I highly recommend it and I'll be purchasing additional drives as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ding Dansen

customer_reviews.title: Asus z97a Intel i7 4700 XFX RX 480 16 gb DDR3 memory Corsair 750w psu I previously had a sea gate two terabyte drive crap out on
customer_reviews.text: Works well! System specs: Asus z97a Intel i7 4700 XFX RX 480 16 gb DDR3 memory Corsair 750w psu I previously had a sea gate two terabyte drive crap out on me. It was only 2 and a 1/2 years old. I installed this drive and loaded windows 10 in about 20 minutes from a usb 3.0 flash drive. It definitely does boot up quicker than a stand rotational drive, but it is not as quick as the SSD in my i5 laptop. Bios times boot are usually around 13-14 seconds. Installing programs you can also see a somewhat notable speed difference. I'll have to see how it handles some heavy audio mixing, video rendering, and gaming.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: I purchased and then received it on October 31, ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and then received it on October 31, 2016. I started using it immediately on my xbox one through usb 3. The drive has been working flawlessly. It is quiet and fast. I was worried about the purchase when I saw many people saying that Seagate drives die fast, but so far, I'm loving the purchase for my current use. Load time are faster than any of my friends that play online with me. For example, in the game The Division, I can have someone fast travel to a location for everyone to follow and I can be there before the leader by 5 to 10 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton O.

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a Great Product but Delivery was Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, I surely would buy it again. Easy installation and I was able to clone it in very little time. It's much faster than what I had before. Now the bad news. The delivery was terrible. The box was placed on wet grass about half way up my drive way in rainy weather. I was aware that the product was going to be delivered and was checking for it, and just happened to catch it in my flashlight when I was looking for something else in the yard. It appeared to have been recently delivered since the box had yet get wet. Come on Amazon, you can do better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Oravetz

customer_reviews.title: No diff for me
customer_reviews.text: I swapped out my old drive for this new one after using the Seagate utility to clone the drive. Surprisingly I have found no difference in performance of Windows 10 nor my programs. Some small improvement in backup speed of my data. I have seen no programs to manage the process of copying frequently used files into memory, e.g. the operating system. Disappointed. I did not need additional storage. I installed the old HD as a third drive, but have no use for it. The hard drive is otherwise acceptable, thus my three star rating.
customer_reviews.author: BJB

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy installation. Well worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: As we all know an SSD 1TB is in the $200.00 range and higher. I thought I would try this SSHD priced at the time $73.00. I have a 500GB SSD on another computer with an intel. i-5 3.4GHZ and 16GB of DDR 3 RAM. I installed this SSHD with an intel.i-7 4.2GHZ 16GB of DDR 4 RAM. The 1TB SSHD is faster than the 500GB SSD. I saved over $100.00 and didn't see a drop in speed from what I'm used to and gained 500GB of storage space.
customer_reviews.author: LARRY

customer_reviews.title: Nice compromise. Good drive.
customer_reviews.text: Before this, I've had two SSDs that crapped out on me. I have confidence in the old style spin drives like this and SSHD means you get performance like an SSD but costing much less. I use this for business so that is my only reference. It's a bit slower booting up than the SSD but once it's ready, it seems as fast as the SSD and transitioning from screen to screen seems smoother somehow. I'm liking it and give it a Hoorah! I believe these are made in the Netherlands and not China. Another plus, if I'm correct.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Will stick with these for hybrid HDD
customer_reviews.text: Replacing stock HDD with this hybrid. It does seem a lot faster on boot-up and during use. Replacement went pretty well on a 5 yr old system running windows 8.1 (I know... I know..). It runs well enough that I will upgrade to win10. I have had 2-3 times it would not turn on over first 3 months, but that was probably more me than the HDD as it was my first HD replacement. I want to switch my newer CPU with one (2TB), though will probably go SSD for boot up.
customer_reviews.author: SMF

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: After owning a few dozen hard drives in over 25 years of computing, I finally had the inevitable disk drive failure. (Fortunately, I had just implemented a plan for automatic disk backup to the cloud!) Installation into the computer and reinstalling Windows and recovering my files was relatively easy. Though I don't use this for heavy-duty gaming, having the hybrid SSHD makes for quicker access to editing and mastering music files.
customer_reviews.author: curtcass

customer_reviews.title: Linux Perspective
customer_reviews.text: Mint 18.3. Btrfs or Ext4 file system. Boots a full install to desktop after Bios posts, in 21 sec vs my best SSD in 15 sec vs regular HDD in 27 sec. Apps like Chrome, Firefox, Nemo, Kpat, open almost as fast as SSD. For $75 and 1Tb capacity this is a positive way to go for more response. The 5 year warranty is positive. The only negative is noise. Just the same as any 7200 rpm drive, there is the constant hum. In a dead silent 15 x 20 room, I can easily hear it 15' away. This is normal, and no different that other brands.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ion May

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to the speeds of an SSD
customer_reviews.text: Not anywhere even close to as fast as my true SSD. I think this is more of a gimmick than anything. My PC boots in 6 seconds with an SSD. It takes 35 seconds with this SSHD.
customer_reviews.author: dspowell

customer_reviews.title: Don't trust this drive.
customer_reviews.text: At first the drive was normal and then it became wonderful, and then after 4 or 5 months, my house lost power for 5 or 6 hours and then my operating system was lost. It appeared that the drive had moved too much of the operating system into the solid state cache, and then without power, all of it went away. A complete betrayal.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Beckwith

customer_reviews.title: These Drives Die
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what is wrong with these drives, but I haven't had one last longer than 7 months. Sure Seagate helped me replace the first one, but with another drive that has now died again, just quicker. Something is wrong with their hybrid line, I have never had issues with anything else they have put out, but 2 in a row is a horrible sign...
customer_reviews.author: TheyNamedMeUnlucky

customer_reviews.title: SSHD Drives do speed up HDD.
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this SSHD. I assumed that the SSHD was more of a gimmick but it actually does speed up load times. I use this SSHD in conjunction with my SSD main drive. Mainly I put all my games on the SSHD and the OS on the SSD. I added a screen shot of UserBenchmark which it scored about 88%.
customer_reviews.author: CBerg

customer_reviews.title: This Drive is working well!
customer_reviews.text: Thank You Amazon! The Drive is working Lovely - No Complaints Buyer - If you are using cloning software - this drive can not be powered by a USB connection, it has to have a full SATA power supply connection. Hook it into the same computer you are cloning from and use Windows (Copy & Paste) you will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jbuck406

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly in iMac (has socket for temperature sesor)
customer_reviews.text: The only brand (as far as I know) that fits in iMac because of the Temperature Sensor. Very satisfied with speed and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speed, great capacity
customer_reviews.text: Didn't notice much of a difference at first (upgraded from a standard 7200rpm drive) but once I loaded all drivers and software, things sped up. It took about two days for me to realize the difference but now things load up very fast. I have used Seagate before and will continue to use them in all of my custom builds. Great speed, great capacity, and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: This hard drive is the best I've had in a long time
customer_reviews.text: This hard drive is the best I've had in a long time. I took a chance on the hybrid because I know what they are usually used in and they also usually last. Plus I've had bad luck with many other hdd and serial drives alike dying after only months.. This is still working perfectly. I Have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Subscriber

customer_reviews.title: Great Speed and Price
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to see the durability of this SSHD, but as far as I’m concerned, I’m sure it will make it very far, just like the 8-year old HDD it was replacing haha. So far I love the speed of the drive, and the ease of installing everything to it quickly after migrating my drive over. It’s a lot of fast storage for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Cortland Haefele

customer_reviews.title: I love it, it works well and solid state drives ...
customer_reviews.text: This unit works exceedingly well just as Seagate products that I have been using for years. I replaced a Seagate Barracuda drive with this and although they claimed that it was 10X faster than normal drives I have found that it is slightly faster than my 7500 rpm Barracuda. I love it, it works well and solid state drives are the future.
customer_reviews.author: Hanjad

customer_reviews.title: Works great....for a little while
customer_reviews.text: Died after 3 months. Worked great when it works. Really fast load times. But after 3 months bad sectors started popping up which quickly cascaded into total drive failure. Didn't even bother with returning. I will never get another Seagate drive again.
customer_reviews.author: tertl1

customer_reviews.title: Not as fast as a SSD but it does seem ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as fast as a SSD but it does seem to improve Windows boot times considerably over my old WD Blue HD. Windows boot time is around 15 seconds on my rig. There is also a noticeable improvement on Steam loading times.
customer_reviews.author: BuildHobbyist

customer_reviews.title: Very fast
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from a HDD hard drive to this Hybrid drive and it was definitely an upgrade. This is very quick compared to my last hard drive and perfect to install my larger games to save my SSD for other items.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive drive replacement with performance boost
customer_reviews.text: Replaced drives in a computer which had mirrored disks. This not only met my needs as I needed 3.5" factor, but price, and also being hybrid offered additional performance. I wouldn't state the performance is like going from a rotational-only to ssd but there was a noticeable speed boost. Great drive, no problems. Very happy I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: rm -rf /*

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good drive. I have noticed significant speed differences in ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good drive. I have noticed significant speed differences in applications that I run on a daily basis due to the 8gb ssd partition on the drive. Seems to be very loud at times and I have noticed the drive likes to operate when I am not using the PC. That might be when it shifts things from regular hdd to sdd. I am not sure. Great performance and value.
customer_reviews.author: Codi Foster

customer_reviews.title: this is amazing and well worth the money over a SSD at ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a Sata 2 7200rpm Hard drive before and from day 1 of owning it i was getting 100% disk usage almost 90% of the time destroying my fps in games and I just got this today and i haven't seen it hit 100% once even when installing tons of updates and downloading games at the same time! this is amazing and well worth the money over a SSD at the same price due to the 1TB storage and speed
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Adams

customer_reviews.title: Not an SSD, but Sure as Hell Competes With It
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gaming computer I built for my best man. The operating system starts up wicked fast as do the games he plays most often. Even when playing games he doesn't often play, load times are still noticeably faster than on a standard hard disk drive.
customer_reviews.author: Reiden Uses Ubuntu

customer_reviews.title: Finally Installed It and WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: Took me over a year to go back to my project and install this drive and whoa! I'm so glad I did! Windows 10 pro startup in 10-15 seconds! I am AMAZED! Will definitely buy again for my next budget build!
customer_reviews.author: TechbyGP

customer_reviews.title: After a delay of one year finally put together a ...
customer_reviews.text: After a delay of one year finally put together a gaming PC, the hard drive is currently working as expected, it is quite fast for a hybrid drive, it is connected in the 6 mb/s channel and have no regrets, its quiet and does not get that warm, makes it ideal for a gaming only PC
customer_reviews.author: Frank Bruce Cuadra

customer_reviews.title: It is a good product, but nothing excellent.
customer_reviews.text: The advertisement said it would make my applications load up faster. The only software that has sped is my operating system. It boots up very fast, but I am disappointed that my other applications do not load any faster than before. Of course it does once it loads up in the cache in my processor or hard drive cache, but it did that with the other hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Martin

customer_reviews.title: It is not SSD like speed but alot faster
customer_reviews.text: Solid and fast, my son loves the speed improvements. It is not SSD like speed but alot faster. Things load quicker and less hang ups. Knowing tthat I replaced a 5 year old barracuda says the longevity of this drive. It should be noted this is one of the companies to trust to back up their products.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Daken

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stand up to time
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these drives from my wife and I as our game installation drives. Both have failed within 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Much faster than the traditional hard drive I replaced. Not SSD speeds but the speed increase is noticeable. So good that I purchased the smaller one for my laptop. Strong 5 year warranty. It is a little noisier but that's expected.
customer_reviews.author: Chi

customer_reviews.title: Drive failed after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: This hard drive began exhibiting signs of failures after only 2 years of light use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wait for a sale and grab a SSD
customer_reviews.text: After my HDD died after 6 faithful years, I had to get at least 1TB of storage but loved my 500GB SSD that was making certain games and my OS run buttery smooth. I Didn't have the cash at the time to pay for 1TB of SSD and this hyrbrid seemed like it would be an improvement of my HDD but I found it to just BARELY be faster than my HDD. Most times it feels like it's going as fast as a HDD. It still does its main function well but paying that much for 1TB of basically HDD load times, kind of sucks. Just my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan B.

customer_reviews.title: Works for iMac Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly to replace a failed drive in an iMac Intel 21.5" EMC 2308 Model A1311 / Late 2009. Just make sure the brand of the drive you're replacing is the same to ensure the thermal sensor works as designed. A different model hard drive might make the fans spin at full speed.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Mawhorter

customer_reviews.title: NOT a SSD
customer_reviews.text: Loaded this thing up and found out it is NOT a SSD. False advertisement and it is past the return date. Do NOT buy from seller.
customer_reviews.author: L.R

customer_reviews.title: good hard drive
customer_reviews.text: This works great as my primary drive for my desktop. it might not be as fast a solid state but it is fast and has plenty of space. I've bought many of these when I build a computer for my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Blackwood

customer_reviews.title: Seagate drives!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 other Seagate drives in this case...I needed more space. They are superior quality and have a long durability record for me. Easy to install and format, was up and transferring data to it in less then 45 min....
customer_reviews.author: Dana Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, cloned my old disk with no issues!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased so far, everything is stable and seems faster than my Barracuda that this one replaces. The warehouse offer was amazing, I had to snatch it up!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: This FireCuda and its hybrid ability make for a faster internal drive
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at the difference between an internal hard drive and a hybrid drive. I had to replace a hard drive so I thought I would give the hybrid style a try on my desktop. A significant difference and definitely worth the extra cost. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous12345

customer_reviews.title: very shiny HDD for my iMac
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for my 27" 2009 iMac. It's the same brand as the OEM drive, just slightly higher RPMs. Works great, although it hasn't been that long in use.
customer_reviews.author: JobMcKee

customer_reviews.title: I was impressed at how easy the installation was
customer_reviews.text: I rated this a 5 even though I wasn't able to use it. I wanted this generic due to the SSHD. My computer wouldn't get past the download to install. This hard drive did it's part <smile>, my Gateway just required a different hard drive. I was impressed at how easy the installation was, being 67 years old, I expected it to be a much harder.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Martin

customer_reviews.title: Slightly faster
customer_reviews.text: This drive is slightly faster than a standard hard drive and it's lasted a long time without any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Steam library
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been great! It was easy to install and has done a good job of containing my growing steam library.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Good drive - worked right away (my old Seagate 1TB ...
customer_reviews.text: It is what I expected. Good drive - worked right away (my old Seagate 1TB quit after 8 years). One thing I have to ask though, either Amazon or Seagate - when I opened the box, it smelled like it came from some either moldy or smoking house. Very overpowering. First time I encounter that with an HDD. Why would that be? But, excellent drive, reasonably fast and can't beat the PPR.
customer_reviews.author: morzh

customer_reviews.title: Died within 12 months
customer_reviews.text: Drive lasted less than a year, thankfully it was covered by seagates warranty. Took about 1 week for replacement. Replacement was refurbished version.
customer_reviews.author: Sin Dajjin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value
customer_reviews.text: The Seagate Firecuda is in my opinion currently the best SSHD on the market. This model is great for gamer's looking to improve their pc experience or people wanting to upgrade their console. I have now used 2 of the 1tb Firecuda's and couldn't be happier with the product. 5 Star review for a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Faster is better.
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed that data retrieval is quicker than the previous 5400 RPM HDD I was using and that is the extent of my experience with a hard drive. I do not play games on a computer but I chose this HDD because the response time is necessarily faster for that use and I take advantage of the technology.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri J.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome I am glad i got the hybrid drive
customer_reviews.text: Awesome I am glad i got the hybrid drive. Boots to windows 10 and opens Firefox in about 30 seconds. Highly recommend if you need more space then SSD but still want fast boot times and only want to buy 1 drive.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Good but a little expensive
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use this product for video storage and to store some of my games on it, and it’s been doing a great job at maintaining orders.
customer_reviews.author: Zippyman

customer_reviews.title: Impressive hard drive almost almost felt like I had an SSD in my system
customer_reviews.text: Impressive hard drive almost almost felt like I had an SSD in my system. Installed an OS on it and booted pretty quick, gaming was loading pretty fast as well. A tad slower than SSD but barely noticeable long load times. Good stuff, Seagate.
customer_reviews.author: Chanthon Lam

customer_reviews.title: Hard drive was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I have an old Asus G50 desktop with the original hard drive with Windows 10. Hard drive was easy to install, works great, and is much quicker. HD (mts 60i) video rendering time was shortened about 35% versus the last hard drive. Check your height dimensions on your current hard drive and compare it with this one to make sure you don't have to get any spacers to adjust for the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Why was this so easy????? I just plopped it into my computer used the seagate disk wizard yanked my old drive out and it works perfect all in about 20 mins. Had like half my old 1TB full. My computer initially loaded up so fast, first time I launched BF 1 it went too fast for me to even tab back to reddit. Easier than expected
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great Hybrid!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Hybrid. Saves tons of money from an SSD and works great. I've noticed small increases in speeds all around, from startup in PC and loading video games, etc. Really satisfied with this drive!
customer_reviews.author: Dzmitry93

customer_reviews.title: works well, it's a laptop HD
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded my laptop HD, but probably should have gotten a SSD. It works well. A friend installed it for me. No problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: Allen T. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Nice drive really dont see much speed increase
customer_reviews.text: had some time getting my windows 7 backup image onto this drive but once I did the drive has been working great really dont see much speed increase over the standard Seagate 1.0tb I had in here before and it was 4 years old.
customer_reviews.author: THXkid

customer_reviews.title: Top for gaming.
customer_reviews.text: We install these in all of our gaming builds. Used to use WD black, but these hybrid drives are so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This hybrid is great to get that fast startup you need when starting ...
customer_reviews.text: This hybrid is great to get that fast startup you need when starting windows without having to spend a fortune on a large ssd. Inexpensive upgrade that is worth doing if you need a new drive anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Citti

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good quality hdd for my gaming rig i was building. This was one of my picks. Great value for the price. Super fast and stable. Would reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy N.

customer_reviews.title: dead after a few months Lesson learned!
customer_reviews.text: Drive lasted only a few months before it formed bad sectors, lesson learned don't use hybrid drives, especially SSHD drives claiming to be meant for gaming!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Gunder

customer_reviews.title: Decent Blend of Capacity and Performance
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drive quickly to replace a failing unit in one of the house machines. So far it's got about 80 hours of uptime. No failures, no burps, no odd noises, the drive runs cool and performs reasonably.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Plavnicky

customer_reviews.title: Made My Desktop Perform Better Than New
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a failing hard drive in a somewhat old PC, and it has made a huge difference to the speed and performance of that machine. Makes it feel better than new again.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Seagate FireCuda 1TB Solid State Hybrid Drive Performance SSHD – 3.5 Inch Sata 6Gb/s Flash
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product for a C: drive option when building a desktop!
customer_reviews.author: Sam-Wise

customer_reviews.title: Great drive
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great drive. Decently quick and has plenty of space. I would absolutely recommend getting an ssd for gaming thou. Performance is much better
customer_reviews.author: Brian Heath

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy
customer_reviews.text: Really does rev a normal hard drive into a turbo drive! Amazing power and speed and storage. Easy to install. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: won't last
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these and one after another they failed. each after a update from Microsoft. got the black screen thingy and could not get them to recover.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T. Houtz

customer_reviews.title: Seems like I made the right choice.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to get my Nephew an SSD, but even a single Terabyte SSD is really expensive. Then I settled for a hybrid drive I thought I was making a big compromise, but it turns out I might have made the best purchase idea.
customer_reviews.author: Karlgamer

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: Good hard drive. After a couple years of use, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: charles brauneck

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hard Drive
customer_reviews.text: The hard drive in my older model Apple MacBook Pro was having problems and I was afraid it was about to fail. This drive was easy to install and I got my MacBook up and running like new in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl A. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - Fast Boot
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my original desktop hard drive (it died) and had zero issues with the FireCuda. My BIOS detected it upon hook up, and installed my OS (Windows 7) without any problems. Boot-up is noticeably faster ... Windows starts almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Proud

customer_reviews.title: Cloning was awesome. Actually
customer_reviews.text: Cloning was awesome. Actually, it was even better! My HDD was almost dead, and this great SSHD cloned it and restored everything. Now I am using the same operating system (with all programs, updates, everything) as it was on the old drive.
customer_reviews.author: Student

customer_reviews.title: A good improvement over a normal HDD
customer_reviews.text: This hard drive has been working for a few days now and it came as described. It boots quickly, about 5 seconds after you hit the power button you can log in. A good improvement over a normal HDD. I used a USB boot drive and had no issues installing windows 10 on this hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: Phil from AK

customer_reviews.title: I love this drive...
customer_reviews.text: I love this drive... This replaced an older Seagate 7200 rpm drive. I now boot up in less than 10 seconds. I does not come with software but I simply downloaded a free copy of Macrium Reflect and the copy process was easy. Highly Recommended .
customer_reviews.author: Michael P Diehl

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Really fast and durable SSHD compared to the regular HHD, specially how important it is when it comes to speed, and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: HD swap out
customer_reviews.text: Great Drive, quiet, not sure if Win 7 takes advantage of the solid state part, it's not booting up any faster, (but this is from a recovery, not a 'clean install'...) none the less the other HD was getting odd errors, so before it totally took a dump I backed it up and did a recover on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Seagate to the rescue!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my original 320gb failed hard drive on my 2009 imac with this. Lots more space and super quiet. Took about 40min to carefully install and was very affordable. Will consider Seagate for future computer hardware.
customer_reviews.author: DragonBreath

customer_reviews.title: Faster than expected
customer_reviews.text: I use this drive to store my photo library (about 300 GB), and the drive is a lot faster than I expected. The caching is very effective, and most of the time, it feels more like SSD than hybrid. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R.

customer_reviews.title: Running as smooth as a prize-winning race horse!
customer_reviews.text: After receiving a dead WD Blue 1TB SATA 6 Gb/s 7200 RPM 64MB Cache 3.5 Inch Desktop Hard Drive (WD10EZEX) and exchanging it for another dead WD Blue 1TB SATA 6 Gb/s 7200 RPM 64MB Cache 3.5 Inch Desktop Hard Drive (WD10EZEX), I received this drive and it is alive, installed and running as smooth as a prize-winning race horse. Great drive for the money! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbeauknows

customer_reviews.title: Very good Hard Drive
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good hard drive. Its fast and quiet and easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Ray562

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 hard drives Seagate 1TB FireCuda and they are both dead. More Seagate will not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Volodymyr Soloviov

customer_reviews.title: fast hybrid drive, works very well, noticeable speed increases, 5yr warranty, competitive price. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: fast hybrid drive, works very well, noticeable speed increases, 5yr warranty, competitive price. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Perspectech

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t use it because I thought it’s for laptops but unfortunately it’s for desktops When I was looking for hhsd I wrote “hhsd for laptop” and surprise desktop hhsd showed
customer_reviews.author: Hussam Noor

customer_reviews.title: Do it.
customer_reviews.text: This drive is phenomenal! It breathes new life into my 2013 PC build. Just upgraded from an old standard 1TB hard drive to this bad boy, and there is a noticeable difference right off the bat. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Glen E.

customer_reviews.title: Fast 1TB FireCuda SSHD
customer_reviews.text: Works well and very fast after it replaced the previous hdd. The nand part of the hdd sped up the OS startup seconds quicker. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: It's great but it took awhile to see the boost
customer_reviews.text: It took awhile to see the real proformance boost and I wish there was software for managing the solid state portion of the drive. It is cool however that the software isn't required and it is fully functional right away.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice compromise between price and function.
customer_reviews.text: Next time, I'll probably spring for the full SSHD but for now I needed to save some money and this hybrid was a great compromise. Easy setup, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Conti

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hard Drive Replacement
customer_reviews.text: One of the fastest hard drive / SSD combinations you can get out there. Excellent replacement for older hard drives out there without having to sacrifice capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. No complaints. Besides, Seagate cloning software works like a charm
customer_reviews.author: LOU

customer_reviews.title: so far seems to work great and do notice an increase in speed on load ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to fire up perfectly well, so far seems to work great and do notice an increase in speed on load times (not much but enough to make a difference) Will update as time goes by.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hard drive and brings my 10 year old computer ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hard drive and brings my 10 year old computer up faster and quicker to start playing games or on internet. Really Happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Dwinin

customer_reviews.title: This hybrid hard drive is excellent, saw a much need speed/response in my pc ...
customer_reviews.text: This hybrid hard drive is excellent, saw a much need speed/response in my pc after install. Excellent for the price! Would definitely order again
customer_reviews.author: Branden M.

customer_reviews.title: Great SSHD for Linux
customer_reviews.text: I use this drive on a Lenovo workstation that runs Linux. I use it for video editing and casual gaming. It works well and has no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Stud

customer_reviews.title: Good drive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to dual boot my computer and it has been working flawlessly since I got I know an SSD would be faster however this drive does all I need it to do and is still really fast and a much better price
customer_reviews.author: darkjedi7

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: Mine died after a year - I had to go back to my PS4 factory hdd.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value and speed of delivery !!
customer_reviews.text: The speed at which this was delivered is amazing !! The product itself is fantastic and functions as perfectly as advertised. I'm absolutely thrilled with my experiences with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Everett Higgs

customer_reviews.title: It is a beast. I use it for Adobe ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a beast. I use it for Adobe products such as Illustrator and Photoshop. Along with my enhanced graphic card, my work loads quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Good Sam

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be a decent drive. I find ...
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a decent drive. I find it surprisingly loud, but that could be because I am so used to full SSDs. It seems a little sluggish at times, but again I think I am just used to the SSD in my Macbook.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

product_meta.title: Seagate FireCuda 1TB Solid State Hybrid Drive Performance SSHD – 3.5 Inch Sata 6Gb/s Flash Accelerated Cache for Gaming PC Desktop (ST1000DX002)
product_meta.description: Ideal for gaming PCs, FireCuda SATA SSHD hard drives feature SSD performance and HDD capacities. Enjoy 7200 RPM speeds for a faster, seamless gaming experience—from loading maps to booting levels. Choose from a variety of speeds and cache for an optimized rig and enjoy low power consumption for a more cost effective setup. Flash-accelerated HDD technology allows the hard drive to limit drive access, saving power. Lower power components create less heat — resulting in better frame rates and computer performance. They even come with a five-year limited warranty for long-term peace of mind.
feature_bullets: Store games and play them faster with an internal SSHD drive delivering SSD performance and HDD capacities
Perfect for PC gaming, this hybrid hard drive helps load maps and boot levels faster with flash enhanced speeds
Choose from a variety of capacities for an optimized rig
Low power consumption means a more cost effective setup
Get long term peace of mind with the included five year limited warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars677 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
